languages.text: {n}Там, где все слышат музыку, вы распознаете череду шифрованных директив крошечному пособнику. Отвлекая зрителей напускной нелепостью, крыса безукоризненно слушается команд флейтиста, "неудачно" направляя шарики мимо цели.{/n}

{n}Where others hear music, you discern a series of coded directives being issued to the flute player's tiny accomplice. The rat distracts the spectators with a show of clumsiness while precisely following its master's commands. This is how the balls just "happen" to roll past the goal, much to the chagrin of the participants.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wo andere Musik hören, erkennst du eine Reihe codierter Anweisungen, die dem winzigen Helfer des Flötenspielers erteilt werden. Die Ratte lenkt die Zuschauer mit ihrer scheinbaren Tollpatschigkeit ab, während sie präzise die Befehle ihres Meisters befolgt. Und so rollen die Bälle zum Verdruss der Mitspieler "rein zufällig" durch das Tor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Where others hear music, you discern a series of coded directives being issued to the flute player's tiny accomplice. The rat distracts the spectators with a show of clumsiness while precisely following its master's commands. This is how the balls just "happen" to roll past the goal, much to the chagrin of the participants.{/n}

Und so rollen die Bälle zum Verdruss der Mitspieler "rein zufällig" durch das Tor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Là où les autres n'entendent que de la musique, vous discernez une série d'instructions codées à l'attention du minuscule complice du flûtiste. Le rat détourne l'attention des spectateurs par son apparente maladresse tout en suivant précisément les ordres de son maître. C'est ainsi que les balles manquent le but « par hasard », au grand dam des participants.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Where others hear music, you discern a series of coded directives being issued to the flute player's tiny accomplice. The rat distracts the spectators with a show of clumsiness while precisely following its master's commands. This is how the balls just "happen" to roll past the goal, much to the chagrin of the participants.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Donde los demás oyen música, tú distingues una serie de mensajes en clave dirigidos a la diminuta cómplice del flautista. La rata distrae a los espectadores con su torpeza a la vez que sigue las precisas instrucciones de su amo. Es así como las bolas pasan «accidentalmente» del objetivo, para desánimo de los participantes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Where others hear music, you discern a series of coded directives being issued to the flute player's tiny accomplice. The rat distracts the spectators with a show of clumsiness while precisely following its master's commands. This is how the balls just "happen" to roll past the goal, much to the chagrin of the participants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Donde los demás oyen música, tú distingues una serie de mensajes en clave dirigidos a la diminuta cómplice del flautista. La rata distrae a los espectadores con su torpeza a la vez que sigue las precisas instrucciones de su amo. Es así como las bolas pasan «accidentalmente» del objetivo, para desánimo de los participantes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}他の者が音楽を耳にしている場所では、フルート奏者の小さな共犯者に、暗号化された一連の指令が発せられているのがわかった。ネズミは主人の命令に忠実に従いつつも、不器用さを見せて観客の気をそらしている。このようにして、ボールは「偶然にも」ゴールを通り過ぎるように転がって、参加者たちを悔しがらせるのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Where others hear music, you discern a series of coded directives being issued to the flute player's tiny accomplice. The rat distracts the spectators with a show of clumsiness while precisely following its master's commands. This is how the balls just "happen" to roll past the goal, much to the chagrin of the participants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他の者が音楽を耳にしている場所では、フルート奏者の小さな共犯者に、暗号化された一連の指令が発せられているのがわかった。ネズミは主人の命令に忠実に従いつつも、不器用さを見せて観客の気をそらしている。このようにして、ボールは「偶然にも」ゴールを通り過ぎるように転がって、参加者たちを悔しがらせるのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管这段旋律在别人耳中只是音乐，但你却意识到，对吹笛人的小助手而言，这段音乐实际上是一段指令。这只老鼠一边装出笨拙的样子，一边准确地执行着主人的命令。这就是为什么那些球会“碰巧”滚过目标位置，掏空那些赌徒的口袋。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Where others hear music, you discern a series of coded directives being issued to the flute player's tiny accomplice. The rat distracts the spectators with a show of clumsiness while precisely following its master's commands. This is how the balls just "happen" to roll past the goal, much to the chagrin of the participants.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Diğerleri müziği dinlerken senin kulağına flütçünün minik suç ortağına iletilen, koda dökülmüş bir dizi talimat geliyor. Sıçan, sakarlıkla süslediği gösterisiyle izleyenlerin dikkatini dağıtırken bir yandan da efendisinin komutlarını birebir yerine getiriyor. Katılımcıların hüsranına rağmen "bir şekilde" toplar gol çizgisini aynen bu şekilde geçiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Where others hear music, you discern a series of coded directives being issued to the flute player's tiny accomplice. The rat distracts the spectators with a show of clumsiness while precisely following its master's commands. This is how the balls just "happen" to roll past the goal, much to the chagrin of the participants.{/n}
